sentences.sContent: He prayed to God night and day endue him with the spirit of holiness.
sentences.sContent_eng: He prayed to God night and day endue him with the spirit of holiness.
sentences.sCn: 他日夜祈求上帝赋予他虔敬的心。

sentences.sContent: The value of life is up to the ultimate mission you endue with yourself .
sentences.sContent_eng: The value of life is up to the ultimate mission you endue with yourself .
sentences.sCn: 生命的价值取决于你赋予自己的终极使命。

sentences.sContent: The society endues us the mission , and the clients endue us the responsibility !
sentences.sContent_eng: The society endues us the mission , and the clients endue us the responsibility !
sentences.sCn: 社会赋予我们使命，客户赋予我们责任！

trans.tranOther: to invest or provide, as with some quality or trait
